name: Angry Ninja Smasher HD Free - The Best Bone Crusher Game Challenge for iPhone & iPad
name_original: Angry Ninja Smasher HD Free - The Best Bone Crusher Game Challenge for iPhone & iPad
description:
Are you great ant smasher?
Do you need more challenging task?
Can you smash these angry ninjas?

The best free smasher game out there!

Ninja army approaching and you need to smash this army. Fortunatelly you are so talented fighter that you could easily smash these with your finger, you just need to tap the ninja with your finger and crush them. Good game no need to be complex, check out for yourself.

[ FEATURES ]

+ Funny app to pass time
+ Tap with your finger
+ Several ninjas to smash
+ Each ninja behaves differently
+ Simple gameplay (no big learning curve)
+ Exciting
+ Best arcade game

Check it now, how many ninjas you can smash?

Download this smasher game while it's FREE

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type "Codecube Brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the AppStore!
Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support :)
